data_table.description: Reproductive History Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RHXB1
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did the participant have menstrual periods within 2 years prior to her last visit? Q1 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB2
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had any menstrual periods or bleeding during the last 2 years? Q2 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB4
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Was this a natural period, or was it due to the use of hormones, or to some other cause? Q4 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB6
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you reached menopause? Q6 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB8
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Was your menopause natural or the result of surgery or radiation? Q8 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB9
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you having hot flashes? Q9 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB10
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Since your last ARIC visit on (date) have you taken or used any female hormone pills, skin patches, shots, or implants? Q10 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB11A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Please give me the names of all female hormones you have used since that exam, starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name 1. Q11a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB11B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Please give me the names of all female hormones you have used since that exam, starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name 1. Concentration (mg or mcg units). Q11b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB12
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 1. Q12 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB14
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q14 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB17A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Do (did) you take this hormone by mouth? Q17a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB18
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How did/do you use this hormone? Q18 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB20B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Q20b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB21
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Where is (was) your implant placed? Q21 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB23
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Q23 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB23A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Name 2. Q23a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB23B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Concentration (mg or mcg units). Q23b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB24
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 2. Q24 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB26
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q26 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB29A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Do (did) you take this hormone by mouth? Q29a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB30
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How did/do you use this hormone? Q30 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB32B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Q32b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB33
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Where is (was) your implant placed? Q33 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB35
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did participant have a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy at the time of her last visit? Q35 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB36
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At your last visit on (date), you reported prior surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed. Have you had additional surgery on your uterus or ovaries? Q36 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB37
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed? (That is, a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy.) Q37 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB38
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Has your uterus (womb) been removed? Q38 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB40
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had either one or both ovaries removed? Q40 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB5
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. In the past 2 years, how many periods did you miss? Q5 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB13
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q13 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB15
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q15 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB16A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Years. Q16a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXBFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Reproductive history form] [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB16B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Months. Q16b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB17B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do (did) you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q17b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB17C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you take (took) this hormone, how many pills do (did) you take? Q17c [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB19
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) a patch on, how many do (did) you use? Q19 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB20A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Q20 per Q20a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB22
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) your implant in place, how many do (did) you have in place? Q22 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB25
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q25 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB27
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q27 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB28A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Years. Q28a [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB28B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Months. Q28b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB29B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do (did) you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q29b [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB29C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you take (took) this hormone, how many pills do (did) you take? Q29c [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB31
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) a patch on, how many do (did) you use? Q31 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB32A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Q32 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB34
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) your implant in place, how many do (did) you have in place? Q34 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB39
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q39 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB41
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q41 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXBCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB7
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At approximately what age did menopause begin? Q7 [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]

variable.name: RHXB3MONTHS
variable.description: Months of last period/bleeding since exam 1

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Reproductive History Form, visit 3]
